resources.string:
Organize your photos!

Type your desired folder name in necessary section and hit start button.Every photo you take will go to that folder instead of general camera folder.
Folder is not created. Make sure you gave related permisson.
You need to grant camera usage permisson in order to use your camera.
Make sure you have granted camera and storage permissions. Start the app for granting permissions.
You need to grant storage permisson.
